name: @bensons/mcp-exec
description: Enhanced MCP server for secure shell command execution with context preservation and AI optimization

scripts.build: tsc && mkdir -p dist/terminal/static && cp src/terminal/static/terminal.js src/terminal/static/styles.css dist/terminal/static/ && cp node_modules/@xterm/xterm/lib/xterm.js node_modules/@xterm/xterm/css/xterm.css dist/terminal/static/ && cp node_modules/@xterm/addon-fit/lib/addon-fit.js dist/terminal/static/ && cp node_modules/@xterm/addon-web-links/lib/addon-web-links.js dist/terminal/static/
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:server && npm run test:ssh && npm run test:lifecycle && npm run test:annotations && npm run test:dynamic-config

author: Benson Schliesser
